fields.geomagactivity: The greatest expected 3 hr Kp for Dec 16-Dec 18 2015 is 4 (below NOAAScale levels). No G1 (Minor) or greater geomagnetic storms are expected. No significant transient or recurrent solar wind features are forecast.
fields.solarradiation: No S1 (Minor) or greater solar radiation storms are expected. No significant active region activity favorable for radiation storm production is forecast.
